content.raw:
Everything looks great. The NEWS merge conflict needs to be resolved before I am allowed to merge in the changes.

It looks specifically that a NEWS item regarding adding minibatch training to the upcoming 1.4.0 release needs merged with the current NEWS in the default branch.

It looks specifically that a NEWS item regarding adding minibatch training to the upcoming 1.4.0 release needs merged with the current NEWS in the default branch.
